title: MD
biography: National Health Research Award. Associated with Kenya Medical Research Institute.
aiSummary: Samson Mugo is a infectious disease specialist at Kenya Medical Research Institute (Member). Has been published in Advanced science (Weinheim, Baden-Wurttemberg, Germany), Frontiers in plant science, Crop & pasture science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
